name.ja: スーパーポンゴール  Online Game

short.ar: Super PonGoal هي لعبة كرة قدم ممتعة حيث نحاول صد كرات الخصم وإحراز الأهداف من خلال اصطحاب صديق معنا.
short.am: ሱፐር ፖንጎል ከኛ ጋር ጓደኛ ይዘን የተጋጣሚን ኳሶች ለመከልከል እና ጎሎችን ለማስቆጠር የምንሞክርበት አዝናኝ የእግር ኳስ ጨዋታ ነው።
short.bg: Super PonGoal е забавна футболна игра, в която се опитваме да блокираме топките на противника и да вкарваме голове, като вземем…

short.ca: Super PonGoal és un divertit joc de futbol on intentem bloquejar les pilotes del rival i marcar gols acompanyant-nos a un amic.

short.da: Super PonGoal er et sjovt fodboldspil, hvor vi forsøger at blokere modstanderens bolde og score mål ved at tage en ven med os.
short.de: Super PonGoal ist ein lustiges Fußballspiel, bei dem wir versuchen, die Bälle des Gegners zu blockieren und Tore zu erzielen, indem…

short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,no,pt_BR,: Super PonGoal is a fun football game where we try to block the opponent's balls and score goals by taking a friend with us.

short.fa: Super PonGoal یک بازی سرگرم کننده فوتبال است که در آن سعی می کنیم با همراه داشتن یک دوست، توپ های حریف را مسدود کنیم و گل بزنیم.

short.he: Super PonGoal הוא משחק כדורגל מהנה שבו אנו מנסים לחסום את הכדורים של היריב ולהבקיע שערים על ידי לקיחת חבר איתנו.

short.ja: Super PonGoal は楽しいサッカー ゲームで、友達と一緒に相手のボールをブロックしてゴールを決めます。

short.uk: Super PonGoal — це весела футбольна гра, де ми намагаємось блокувати м’ячі суперника та забивати голи, взявши з собою друга.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super PonGoal is a fun football game where we try to block the opponent's balls and score goals by taking a friend with us.
There is a football field in the game. We can play the goals on this football field. Meet the balls thrown by our opponent. With the goals and try to score a goal by hitting these balls with the castle. We score every time we turn the ball into a goal. With the scores we get, we win the matches by gaining an advantage over our opponents and continuing the game with new companions. PonGoal has emerged as a fun football game designed for lovers of two-player games.

To swipe Install this extension to play the Super PonGoal Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
